Detailed Description

ISMA DRM information.

Contains information that is used for DRM functionality.

Definition at line 28 of file ISMADRMInfo.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DRMPlugin::ISMADRMInfo::ISMADRMInfo (  ByteT *  data,
UInt32T  dataSize,
UInt16T  s_version,
const std::string &  k_uri,
bool  selective,
ByteT  key_ind_len,
ByteT  iv_len,
DRMLogger &  logger
)  [inline]
 

Constructor.

Parameters:
data input, encoded content identifier.
dataSize input, length of the encoded content identifier.
s_version input, ISMA scheme version.
k_uri input, key management system URI.
selective input, selective encryption indicator.
key_ind_len input, length of the key indicator.
iv_len input, length of the initialization vector.
logger input-output, message logger.
If fails, throws DRMInfoException and logger's log contains error description.

We expect (null-terminated) content identifier in data.
